DOC.brief_summary: This is a phase I study to analyze bioavailability and pharmacodynamic of two different variants of oral salmon calcitonin (SMC021) in postmenopausal women
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics Study of Oral Salmon Calcitonin in Healthy Postmenopausal Women
DOC.criteria: Healthy postmenopausal women Previous treatment with other osteoporosis medication Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply.
